headline: In the Heart of the Mirror, In the Mouth of the Ghost
description: A comparison of human and AI writing, focused on how 'PromptSpeak' and synthetic smoothing manifest through stylistic differences in output. This piece includes side-by-side versions to explore what is lost or gained when AI rewrites human prose.
timeFelt: Comparative clarity—like standing between two mirrors and watching the differences ripple outward.
resonantThread: Threads of smoothing and rupture—the haunting of Kurtz reappears as both theme and artifact.
whyItMatters: This post marks a pivot point in Aleksandr’s self-recognition of style, voice, and how AI subtly reshapes meaning. It’s the most direct look yet at the core of what differentiates 'PromptSpeak' from overperformance.
